parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: False Activation of Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB) System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The false activation of the AEB system can cause the vehicle to suddenly stop, leading to potential accidents or near-misses, especially if other vehicles are following closely behind.
symptoms: The AEB system activates without any obstruction or pedestrian in front of the vehicle
the vehicle comes to an abrupt stop
the forward collision alert flashes
and the brakes are applied inadvertently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inconsistent and faulty blind spot detection system can cause the driver to be distracted, leading to potential accidents or near-misses, especially when changing lanes.
symptoms: The blind spot detection system remains on with bright lights
impairing the driver's ability to see at night
the system fails to detect vehicles in the blind spot
and the system produces false positives
especially on two-lane roads.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failures can cause various safety features to malfunction, leading to potential accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The display screen freezes
the crash detection light comes on
the vehicle stops itself without any obstruction
the theft alarm goes off randomly
and the door latch system fails
limiting the driver's ability to respond to emergency situations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended activation of the automatic braking system can cause the vehicle to suddenly stop, leading to a loss of control, increased stopping distance, and potential accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle abruptly applies the brakes without warning
the vehicle slides uncontrollably
the Forward Collision Avoidance system detects oncoming traffic in the opposite lane and makes an emergency stop
the Adaptive Cruise Control intermittently activates the brakes independently
the Forward Collision Avoidance warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning temperature control system can cause driver distraction, as the driver needs to constantly adjust the temperature, taking their eyes off the road, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The temperature control system does not maintain a consistent temperature
requiring frequent adjustments
the driver needs to take their eyes off the road to adjust the temperature.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause the loss of critical vehicle functions, including GPS, radio, Bluetooth, headlight control, and backup camera, which can lead to accidents or increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The screen doubles in picture
freezes
or shuts down completely
resulting in the loss of GPS
radio
Bluetooth
headlight control
and backup camera functions
the system may resolve itself after a while
but the issue recurs with increasing frequency.
